page.title: 12W.I.MARKET IN USK AREA.
page.content: An offshoot of the Womens'Institute is the Markets Scheme where the public can buy produce with a "Homemade" label.I am chairman of a busy group based at Usk manned on Thursdays by a band of cheerful hardworking ladies.We give a personal service to our customers who become friends.Working and elderly people value the quality of our home produce.Regular orders are accepted and a national scheme of sending gifts of W.I. produce to various parts of the country is operating. The provision of food freshly baked and preservative-free is the key to our popularity. The marketeers enjoy business days and special days at local shows.The markets will continue to supply goods as long as there is a demand.
